The facts are undeniable: undercounting in the Census would hurt our Pennsylvania. An undercount would result in fewer critical resources for our Commonwealth, resources on which many depend in our #PA06 community. /2

- anything else goes against what this country stands for. I believe in American values - in our potential to be a beacon of hope and light in this world. I believe in the country that welcomed my refugee father as a small boy and his destitute mom. /2
